column1: #Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )

#Text=During participation in the Rehabilitation Project Force , you recount how you were slapped across the face for refusing to climb into a garbage can after being ordered to do so by a leader of your group .
#Text=How did this make you feel ?
#Text=Did you consider leaving the organization at all at this point in time ?
#Text=Why or why not , and why did you remain ?
#Text=AS
#Text=: It was a completely nutty order and I was n't about to comply .
#Text=I ran around the block to get away as the lady who issued the order chased after me .
#Text=I went to the person in charge asking for help but he was not in his office .
#Text=The lady chased me into that office and then hit me across the face .
#Text=I did NOT hit her back because I wanted to show that she was the crazy one .
#Text=However when the Ethics Officer got there , he said I should have complied as she was my superior .
#Text=I felt like it was a huge injustice because the order made no sense and had no purpose .
#Text=She was just trying to exert her " authority " over me .
#Text=But , I did n't want to be in more trouble , so I did my punishment for non-compliance and carried on .
#Text=No , I did not think of leaving then .
#Text=At that point , I just thought that lady was insane , not the entire organization .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )

#Text=After completing your time on the Rehabilitation Project Force , you were appointed to the position of " Commanding Officer of the Flag Land Base 's Communicator " , where you were " responsible for all in-coming and out-going traffic from the executive and obtaining compliance to all orders issued " .
#Text=Did it surprise you that directly after finishing the Rehabilitation Project Force , you were given such a position of responsibility as a Scientology executive ?
#Text=Does this occur often in Scientology to members after they finish their sentence in the Rehabilitation Project Force ?
#Text=AS
#Text=: In the Sea Organization , one is expected to be able to perform any duty – with or without training .
#Text=It 's preached that the salvation of the world is on our shoulders and everyone needs to pull up their bootstraps and make it go right .
#Text=So , the appointment did not surprise me .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )

#Text=Shortly after your promotion from Rehabilitation Project Force member to this position , you were promoted to " Flag Land Bureau Estates Management Chief " , where you were " responsible for all public hotels and services " , and subsequently promoted to the " Commodore 's Messenger Organization ( CMO ) " .

column1: #Text=At the end of chapter 3 , you write how you were " placed under a group justice action , called a Committee of Evidence " , and the committee , " recommended my removal for neglect of duty regarding the schedule " .
#Text=However , a few days later you were told you were assigned to Los Angeles , California , in order to recruit for members to join the CMO .

#Text=Again , this appears to be a pattern of conflicting orders within the organization , where in one instance you were disciplined for perceived slights , and yet directly afterward , promoted to a higher position of authority as a Scientology executive .
#Text=How do you explain this behavior within the organization ?
